command.exec: cd /home/ubuntu/chef-repo; knife bootstrap ${option.Host_IP} -N ${option.Host_Name} -x ubuntu -i /home/ubuntu/.ssh/id_rsa --sudo -E ${job.project} --template-file /home/ubuntu/sawtooth_automation/platform/rundeck-jobs/chef-full.erb ; knife tag create ${option.Host_Name} ${option.Rundeck_Tags} ; knife tag create ${option.Host_Name} ${option.Host_IP}

job.description: This job bootstraps a node against a chef environment. This will also create tags required for rundeck
job.name: register_node_on_chef_server

option.name: Host_IP
option.description: (enter the IP address of the node to register)

option.name: Host_Name
option.description: (enter the host name of the VM to be registered)

option.name: User_Name
option.description: (enter the user name to login to the VM)
